mapper.select: select lol.lol_code, lol.lol_name, m.mem_name ,p.pmem_no, d.dep_name, to_char(lol.lol_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as lol_date, lol.lol_state, lol.lol_reject from lec_open_list lol, professor p, department d, member m where m.mem_no = lol.pmem_no and lol.pmem_no = p.pmem_no and p.dep_code = d.dep_code order by lol.lol_date desc

select lol.*, lp.*, p.*, d.dep_name, d.dep_tel, m.mem_name, m.mem_tel, m.mem_email from lec_open_list lol, lecture_plan lp, department d, professor p, member m where d.dep_code = p.dep_code and p.pmem_no = m.mem_no and m.mem_no = lol.pmem_no and lol.lol_code = lp.lol_code and lp.lol_code = #{lolCode}
select lr.* , c.col_name from lecture_room lr, college c where lr.col_code = c.col_code
